item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

You’re a fool b15

You don’t need [ENDOFNPCDROPLIST] at the bottom at all, and it’s not working because he has no items that are going to drop.

Read full topic

item.title: Npcdrops
item.dc:creator: @b15 b15
item.description:
@b15 wrote:

first of all u dont have an item and amount. second u need to use tab key not space bar. third [ENDOFNPCDROPLIST] should be right under last drop NO GAP. use mine and completely delet urs .plz message me telling me how it went
. ps item 4151 is a abby whip
(yours)
//--------NPCID---------DropType--------Item----Amount–
npcdrop = 84 0 15348 1
npcdrop = 84 0 4087 1
npcdrop = 84 0 1150 1
npcdrop = 84 0 15334 1
npcdrop = 84 0 15349 1
npcdrop = 84 0 15062 1
npcdrop = 2036 0 35 1

[ENDOFNPCDROPLIST]

(mine)
//--------NPCID---------DropType--------Item----Amount–
npcdrop = 84 0 15348 1 4151 1
npcdrop = 84 0 4087 1
npcdrop = 84 0 1150 1
npcdrop = 84 0 15334 1
npcdrop = 84 0 15349 1
npcdrop = 84 0 15062 1
npcdrop = 2036 0 35 1
[ENDOFNPCDROPLIST]
